definition: to match one's strength with/to compete/more competitive/to set oneself against sb/disobliging/to make a special effort

definition: to haggle over every ounce/(fig.) to fuss over minor matters/to split hairs
to gesticulate/to point out/to point the finger of blame
to view sb as an enemy/to be hateful towards
to have a falling out/to have a big argument
to contend on strong grounds/to argue strongly for what is right
to have a competition/to measure with one's hand or arm/to make a gesture of measuring
